translations.translation: Here you can add SSH keys so that you can access your servers.
Name
Key
Loading list of SSH keys...
Oops! Unable to retrieve the list of your SSH keys.
OVH uses SSH to secure encrypted data communications between servers.
There are SSH clients for each operating system. See the guide on creating SSH keys for more information.
Please note that you can also configure additional SSH keys on your instance in order to provide access to others replacing your lost SSH key pair.
Add a key
Stop adding this key
Add this key
Your key is now available.
Give it a name
Enter your 4096 byte key
Oops! Unable to add this key.
This name is already used for another SSH key.
This key is no longer available.
Oops. Unable to delete this key!
Search
Do not delete this key
Confirm deletion
You have not yet added an SSH key.
Click on "Add a key" to fix it!
The name must not exceed 25 characters.
You need to name your key.
You forgot to enter your 4096 byte key.
Your key name may only contain figures, lower-case and/or upper-case letters, and hyphens ( - ), underscores ( _ ) and spaces.
